example.text: The story of Tampa Bay was built with the hard work and talents of people from across the world seeking to build a better life for their families. The [[user]] feels no remorse in attacking families, businesses, nonprofits, cultures, and our economy.

H Res. 11 - Establishing the Select Committee on the Strategic Competition Between the United States and the Chinese Communist Party: In order to ensure the United States remains in the driver's seat of the global economy, we must address our trade relationship and national security. I hope that there will be strong bipartisan action in this space in the days ahead.

I am grateful for the work of my team and the partnership of local leaders, businesses and nonprofits that allows our community to secure grants that will keep Tampa Bay a great place to live and work. I look forward to connecting in the new year and continuing to provide updates on how I am working for you in Washington and Tampa Bay.

That was our national policy for 40 years until a Republican-controlled Congress authorized sending American crude oil abroad in 2015. China exploited that ill-advised Republican policy change, and exports of American crude oil to China increased nearly 100-fold during the Trump Administration to over 391 million barrels.
